revised_title: Advanced Theories of Thick Circular Plate Flexure
tldr: This article investigates the flexure of thick circular plates and the boundary conditions that affect their deflections. The author discusses various types of solutions and their limitations, emphasizing the need for a new type of analysis for thick plates. The study focuses on stress analysis and the use of cylindrical coordinates to understand the behavior of these plates under pressure.
